headline: Is Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: If you are wondering whether Huntington Bancshares is fairly priced or offering value right now, the starting point is understanding how its current share price lines up with different valuation checks. The stock last closed at US$18.02, with returns of 0.7% over 7 days, 1.9% over 30 days, 3.1% year to date and 10.0%, 40.2% and 66.9% over 1, 3 and 5 years respectively. Recent coverage has focused on how regional banks are being assessed on balance sheet strength, interest rate sensitivity...

headline: How Lobbying Spend and Trading Activity Shape Huntington (HBAN) Ahead of Key Margin and Credit Update
summary: In late 2025, Huntington Bancshares Incorporated reported US$40,000 in fourth-quarter lobbying focused on banking and financial services issues, alongside modest insider and congressional trading activity in its shares. The bank is now approaching its 22 January 2026 earnings release, where management’s comments on net interest margin, loan growth, and credit quality could be particularly influential for investors’ views. With Huntington’s upcoming earnings putting net interest margin and...
